data.name: Titania
data.description: Social media maven, bombshell brawler, and Master of Evil, Titania is quick with a block - whether it's Ability Block, Heal Block, or online.

starItems.name: Titania
starItems.description: Social media maven, bombshell brawler, and Master of Evil, Titania is quick with a block - whether it's Ability Block, Heal Block, or online.

4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Crit, gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Crit, gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Crit, clear an additional <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Crit:
 > Gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy.
 > Clear an additional <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
On Crit, clear all negative effects from self.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.
On Crit, clear all negative effects from self.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.
On Crit, clear all negative effects from self.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage.
On Crit, clear all negative effects from self.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Copy and clear all positive effects on primary target, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage.
On Crit, clear all negative effects from self.

Copy and clear all positive effects on primary target, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage.
On Crit, clear all negative effects from self.

Copy and clear all positive effects on primary target, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>120%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, if primary target has <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage.
On Crit, clear all negative effects from self.

Copy and clear all positive effects on primary target, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > If primary target has <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

On Crit, this ability gains +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus.
This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

On Crit, this ability gains +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus.
This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

On Crit, this ability gains +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus.
This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

On Crit, this ability gains +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus.
This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to primary target

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

On Crit, this ability gains +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus.
This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to primary target

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

On Crit, this ability gains +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus.
This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

On Crit, this ability gains +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus.
This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

1.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies.
On Turn, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
On Crit, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

When this character or a <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL PROTECTOR</color> is attacked, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to the attacker for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance per <color=#fff568>Counter</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Damage per <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.

2.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies.
On Turn, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
On Crit, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

When this character or a <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL PROTECTOR</color> is attacked, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to the attacker for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance per <color=#fff568>Counter</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Damage per <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> and <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.
2.nextUpgrade: When this character gains <color=#86e619>1</color> or more positive effects, gain <color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed Bar + heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health

3.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies.
On Turn, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
On Crit, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

Whenever this character gains <color=#86e619>1</color> or more positive effects, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed Bar + heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
When this character or a <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL PROTECTOR</color> is attacked, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to the attacker for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance per <color=#fff568>Counter</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Damage per <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> and <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health

4.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies.
On Turn, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
On Crit, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

Whenever this character gains <color=#86e619>1</color> or more positive effects, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed Bar + heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
When this character or a <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL PROTECTOR</color> is attacked, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to the attacker for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance per <color=#fff568>Counter</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Damage per <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> and <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.
 > <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
4.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Spawn, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed Bar
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> ally turn, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>

5.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies.
On Turn, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
On Crit, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

Whenever this character gains <color=#86e619>1</color> or more positive effects, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed Bar + heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
When this character or a <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL PROTECTOR</color> is attacked, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to the attacker for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance per <color=#fff568>Counter</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Damage per <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, and +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed Bar.
 > On <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> ally turn, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.
 > <color=#fff568>MASTERS OF EVIL</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
